properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 3 at 1:19AM PST until January 4 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 6 inches. Wind gusts up to 35 mph possible.

* WHERE...Eastern Douglas County Foothills, including Toketee
Falls. This includes Highway 138 east of Toketee Falls.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery, snow-covered roads and travel could
be difficult. Snow and blowing snow could reduce visibility to
one quarter of a mile or less at times.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
* Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.

* Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and
limited visibilities.

* See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions.

* A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow
will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET
